page.title: 04Home Life in Alton (1)
page.content:
This survey was conducted with a sample of 71 Alton households.
What kind of house do you live in? Semi-detached...45% Flat.......3% Detached........30% Bungalow...1% Terrace.........21%
Which of these pets do you keep? Goldfish......................45% Cat...........................38% Dog...........................34% Guinea Pig,Gerbil,Hamster.....24% Rabbit........................23% Cage Bird.....................15% Tropical Fish.................10% Others........................10% Mice,Rats.....................1%
How many people in your home smoke? 0......47% 1......35% 2......14% 3......1% 4 or more......... 3%
